https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6QxZRJsODH2kNZ6oNd3qug73FoQ.jpg Bimbisara is a ruthless emperor of Trigarala in 500 BC. In unexpected circumstances, Bimbisara travels in time and reaches the current day not knowing that a power-thirsty doctor Subramanya Sastry and Kethu are already waiting for him to come. Bimbisara has to deal with modern day hustle and bustle. Bimbisara
